nodes.text: The crime lady Valarian maintained a club on the planet Tatooine by the year 4 ABY. It housed a dungeon that Valarian considered to be much more comfortable than the one located in the palace of her rival, Jabba Desilijic Tiure.

The club was first mentioned in one of the bad endings of the Star Wars: Choose Your Destiny audio adventure, Choose Your Destiny: An Escape Mission. In this route, Lady Valarian captures a munka miner and states that she will lock him in the dungeon within her club, promising to hold him for ransom. While this ending is non-canon, this article assumes that the information relating to the club's existence is canonical.
